transcript:
Elastick goes, they expand and shrink
Memories blur, faster than you think
One moment's forever, the next's just a blink
In this elastick time, we sync, or swim
Through chocolate summers, frosted year's snow
Seasons change so fast
Time's like a river, flowing clear
The future's now, the past
Tick-tock, the rhythm's on
Time's playin' tricks again
Try, the minute's gold
You can't play match forever
Elastick goes, they expand and shrink
Memories blur, faster than you think
One moment's forever, the next's just a blink
In this elastick time, we sync, or swim
So hold on tight to now
Cause time won't wait for you
This elastick flow
Three seconds precious truth
Clock hands ticking
Like countdown tapering
Your whole life starts
The face stretched like
A rubber band's a bit
Fine like sugar to thought
Elastick goes, they expand and shrink
Memories blur, faster than you think
One moment's forever, the next's just a blink
takeaways: Thời gian trôi nhanh và luôn thay đổi.
Hãy trân trọng từng khoảnh khắc hiện tại.
Thời gian như dòng sông, quá khứ, hiện tại và tương lai liên kết với nhau.
